title: Tokenizing Music with Royal | 3LAU (SotN 8/31)
description:
DJ Justin '3LAU' Blau returns to Bankless to discuss Royal, the platform for decentralizing ownership to music rights.

Royal recently raised $16m and has launched its early access. We've seen crypto take the visual art world by storm - is music next?
